segments.text: hey , Lily , what are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: you mean the boy you met on MSN ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: you're right . He is so funny and I think I'm in love with him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you must be joking . You can't fall in love with someone you've never met !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , but I keep thinking of him every day . And I get really depressed when he's not online .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it's just a crush . You can't be serious .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , this might be silly . But I just can't get him off my mind . And I can't help missing him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes . He said I'm his dream girl .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you shouldn't take it too seriously . It might be a lie .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . I can't tell whether he's serious or not so I need your advice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you should enlarge your circle of real life friends , and then the right person will come along .
segments.speaker: S1
